metadata.dc:description: There is nowadays a revolution of immunosuppressive regimens for trasplantation. The investigation of new drugs on experimental and clinical protocols is very important because is intended to find a better immunosuppressive drug. This activity is based on a better knowledge of immunology and physiopathology of rejection. Alternative non pharmacological methods are used for the control of severe and repetitive rejection and the study of quimerism and xenotransplantation.
metadata.dc:title: Pautas inmunosupresoras. Diferencias y ventajas.
[Immunosuppressive guidelines. The differences and advantages].
